abstract: The automaker said it had a remedy for the potentially sticky accelerator pedals that prompted a global recall of millions of cars.
snippet: The automaker said it had a remedy for the potentially sticky accelerator pedals that prompted a global recall of millions of cars.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT  Toyota Motor has come up with a remedy to fix the millions of cars it recalled because their accelerator pedals could become stuck, dealers and a federal official said Saturday.

headline.main: Toyota to Issue a Fix for Recalled Cars
headline.print_headline: Toyota Has Solution for Recalled Cars, an Official Says

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: LEXUS DIVISION OF TOYOTA MOTOR SALES USA

byline.original: By Micheline Maynard and Nick Bunkley
